law.catch_line: Purchase of equipment -- Extraordinary specialized facilities or services.

text.section: As of January 1, 1978, all new equipment purchases for the Court of Justice shall be made by the Court of Justice and paid from state or other available funds.
The Court of Justice may contract with a local unit of government to furnish extraordinary specialized facilities or services.

law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 72, effective January 2, 1978.
